sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Move existing journal entries for below tables into rpa journal.
Work Queue
Schedule
Process parameter
Package</description>
        <name>Migrate existing journal entries</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[try {

    var tablesList = ["sn_rpa_fdn_work_queue", "sn_rpa_fdn_package", "sn_rpa_fdn_schedule", "sn_rpa_fdn_process_parameter"];

    for (var i = 0; i < tablesList.length; i++) {
        var rpaJournal = new sn_rpa_fdn.RPAJournal();

        var tableName = tablesList[i];
        var tableGR = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        tableGR.query();

        while (tableGR.next()) {

            var elementId = tableGR.getUniqueValue();
            var rpaJournalSysId = rpaJournal.getOrInsertJournal(tableName, elementId);

            if (!gs.nil(rpaJournalSysId)) {

                var rpaJournalGR = rpaJournal.getById(rpaJournalSysId, true);

                var journalGR = new GlideRecord("sys_journal_field");
                journalGR.addQuery("name", tableName);
                journalGR.addQuery("element_id", elementId);
                journalGR.query();

                while (journalGR.next()) {
                    var journalField = journalGR.getValue("element");
                    var journalValue = journalGR.getValue("value");
                    rpaJournalGR[journalField] = journalValue;
                    rpaJournalGR.update();
                }
            }
        }

    }
} catch (ex) {
    gs.error(ex);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-10-12 07:38:36</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>c3101cf453aa1110b957ddeeff7b1291</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>32</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Migrate existing journal entries</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">7a842080c3103010c573d833a840dd36</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">7a842080c3103010c573d833a840dd36</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c3101cf453aa1110b957ddeeff7b1291</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-10-19 14:20:29</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
